item.title: Stock recommendations for 5 September from MarketSmith India

review.headline_rewrite: Stock recommendations for 5 September from MarketSmith India
bullets: Stock market today: Indian equities closed Thursday with modest gains on the benchmarks but sharp losses in the broader market.
The Sensex rose 150 points, or 0.19%, to 80,718, while the Nifty 50 added 19 points, or 0.08%, to settle at 24,734.30.
In contrast, the BSE Midcap and Smallcap indices each dropped 0.60%.
Two stock recommendations by MarketSmith India for 5 September: Buy: Manappuram Finance Ltd (current price: ₹284) - Why it’s recommended: Strong leadership and investment

item.title: Stocks to buy: Raja Venkatraman's recommendations for 5 September

review.headline_rewrite: Stocks to buy: Raja Venkatraman's recommendations for 5 September
bullets: The disappointing response to a significantly retail-friendly move has caught everyone by surprise.
At the close, the Sensex added 150.30 points (0.19%) to 80,718.01, while the Nifty inched up 19.25 points (0.08%) to 24,734.30.
The session reflected profit booking and selective buying, as traders weighed GST optimism against broader market caution, leaving indices off their intraday highs despite
